sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Must be unique (no other section on this page can have the same ID). If you are unsure, leave this blank.

sub_fields.label: Note
sub_fields.message: Please manage menu items under the Food label in the left sidebar. Print menus can be updated under the Site Options panel.

sub_fields.label: Posts per page
sub_fields.name: posts_per_page
sub_fields.instructions: If this value is not set, the section will default to the global `Blog pages show at most` setting under Settings > Reading.
